thread.title: Putin swears to serve Russian people at his inauguration

title: Putin swears to serve Russian people at his inauguration
text:
Putin swears to serve Russian people at his inauguration 3:54pm BST - 01:13
The president compared Russia to a phoenix rising from ashes in his fourth inauguration speech. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The president compared Russia to a phoenix rising from ashes in his fourth inauguration speech. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
